channel.title: CVE Feed for KubiQ -- Remove CPT base (WordPress plugin)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for KubiQ -- Remove CPT base (WordPress plugin)

item.title: CVE-2022-29431|2024-08-03T06:17:55.327Z -- kubiq -- remove%20cpt%20base%20%28wordpress%20plugin%29
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in KubiQ CPT base plugin <= 5.8 at WordPress allows an attacker to delete the CPT base.
